title: Ryanair flight diverted in medical emergency
article: A Dublin-bound passenger plane has been diverted to a German airport due to a medical emergency on board the aircraft. The Ryanair flight from Bucharest declared an emergency shortly before 22:00 GMT. It landed safely minutes later at Cologne Bonn Airport. A spokesperson for Dublin Airport said the flight is now scheduled to arrive at Dublin at 00:45 local time on Wednesday.
